data.description:
Description
A complete timer for Rugby referees. (*) Sections of code courtesy of Simon Taylor, Ambient Power Main Window (cycle through items with select button): - Period timer showing time elapsed and left. - Cards/Injuries timer (configurable duration): can store up to 10 cards/injuries and shows the next expiring ones. Injury timers run with real time, i.e. even when the match clock is paused. - Scores: you can scroll between the different score types (try/conv/pen/drop) to add a score and besides the total score the amounts of the single score types are shown as well (i.e. how many tries/convs/pens/drops). Undo last entry of a team with long press. - Information: shows information and instructions for a given mode. Settings screen (cycle through items with select button): - Can be accessed with select long-press and exited with back button. - Match period duration: you can increase/decrease by one minute. The value is persistently stored. - Card duration: same as above. - Injury duration: same as above. - History: here you can see a time-log of all events registered during the match (scores/cards/injuries/end-of-period). Only four are shown but you can scroll among them with the buttons. Clock still runs even upon exiting the app and automatically warns whenever a timer expires.
